record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.topic: PROTOCOL AMENDING TAX CONVENTION WITH GERMANY
speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session to consider Executive Calendar Nos. 2 and 5, the Tax Convention With Belgium and the Protocol Amending the Tax Convention With Germany; that the Treaty and Protocol be advanced through their various parliamentary stages up to and including the presentation of the resolutions for ratification; and that there now be a division vote on the resolutions en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The treaty and protocol will be considered to have passed through their various parliamentary stages, up to and including the presentation of the resolutions of ratification.
The resolutions of ratification are as follows:
